maker: Three porcelain plaques made at the Sèvres Manufactory, Central reserve possibly painted by Charles-Nicolas Dodin, After engravings of a painting by Jean-Baptiste Greuze
title: Jardiniere
description: Jardiniere; Three porcelain plaques made at the Sèvres Manufactory (French, 1756 - present), Central reserve possibly painted by Charles-Nicolas Dodin (French, 1734 - 1803), After engravings of a painting by Jean-Baptiste Greuze (French, 1725 - 1805); Paris, France; about 1760; Soft paste porcelain; green ground color, polychrome enamel decoration; gilt bronze mounts; 16.7 × 29.2 × 14.3 cm (6 9/16 × 11 1/2 × 5 5/8 in.); 73.DI.62; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
